T02D2969:46b-0: @46b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2969:46b-1: bsgrub bya gza' rnams kyi byad du 'jug par 'dod
T02D2969:46b-2: pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas brag
T02D2969:47a-1: 'gram du song ste mandal gru bzhi khru gang ba /
T02D2969:47a-2: thog phog nas shi ba'i khrag gis thig le brgyad byas la /
T02D2969:47a-3: de'i steng du gza' brgyad kyi snying po gro ga
T02D2969:47a-4: la ra khrag gis bris la shing gdug pa can
T02D2969:47a-5: la btags la gzhag / ra rog po'i snying gi
T02D2969:47a-6: nang du gro ga la bsgrub bya'i ming dang rus
T02D2969:47a-7: gnyis khyi nag po'i khrag gis bris la rjes sa
T02D2969:47a-8: 'am gos dum mam zag pa'i rjes gang rnyed pa
T02D2969:47a-9: dang bcas pa gzhug / ro ras la 'khor lo
T02D2969:47a-11: de'i rtsibs rnams gza'i snying pos bskor ba la lte
T02D2969:47a-12: bar bong bu nag po'i khrag gis che ge mo
T02D2969:47a-13: pa ba sangs kyi byang du chug cig ces brgyad
T02D2969:47a-14: kyi ming gis bcas pa bri /
T02D2969:47a-15: mu khyud la aa mu ka m'a ra ya phat ces pas 'khor ba bri /
T02D2969:47a-16: de nas snying po shin tu bsdus pa la stong
T02D2969:47a-17: phrag gcig bskyar la gtso bo la mchod bstod bya
T02D2969:47a-19: de nas gza' brgyad kyi snying po la zhag sum cu rtsa brgyad bskyar te /
T02D2969:47a-20: gza' rnams la gtor ma byin te /
T02D2969:47a-21: rgyu skar zla ba'i nyi shu dgu'i gza' nges par
T02D2969:47a-22: rgyu ba'i dus su drag shul spyod pa'i sbyin sreg
T02D2969:47a-23: bya ste / aom aa mu ka m'a ra ya
T02D2969:47a-24: phat ces nus tshad bzlas te bsregs pa'i thal ba
T02D2969:47a-25: bya ste / dang / lingga gcig ra thod du bcug ste /
T02D2969:47a-26: bdag nyid lus gcer bur phyung la lus la ra
T02D2969:47a-27: rog po'i khrag gis byugs la gdong ro sol gyis
T02D2969:47a-28: byugs la / skra sbyi bor bcings te dge spyong
T02D2969:47a-29: yin na ro'i skra gyon la phyi ma'i tshes bzhi'i
T02D2969:47a-30: gza' rgyu ba'i dus su ra thod sngon dmar gyis
T02D2969:47a-32: brag dang chu 'thab tu mnan na zla ba dgu nas bsgrub bya gzas zin par 'gyur ro //
